xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
CKEditor.ConfigClass_removePlugins=Disabled Plugins CKEditor.ConfigClass_removePlugins.hint=The list of plugins that have been disabled. CKEditor.ConfigClass_removeButtons=Disabled Toolbar Features CKEditor.ConfigClass_removeButtons.hint=The list of toolbar features that have been disabled. CKEditor.ConfigClass_linkShowAdvancedTab=Link: Show Advanced Tab CKEditor.ConfigClass_linkShowAdvancedTab.hint=Allows you to set link attributes such as id, name, class or style. CKEditor.ConfigClass_linkShowTargetTab=Link: Show Target Tab CKEditor.ConfigClass_linkShowTargetTab.hint=Allows you to set the link target attribute (e.g. to open the link in a new tab). CKEditor.ConfigClass_loadJavaScriptSkinExtensions=Load JavaScript Skin Extensions CKEditor.ConfigClass_loadJavaScriptSkinExtensions.hint=Some rendering macros are displayed using JavaScript code. Loading the JavaScript code improves the WYSIWYG aspect of the editor but it may cause problems if the JavaScript code interferes with the CKEditor code or if it changes content outside of the macro output boundaries. CKEditor.ConfigClass_advanced=Advanced Configuration CKEditor.ConfigClass_advanced.hint=You can write a JavaScript snippet to modify directly the configuration object. Check the {0}CKEditor documentation{1} for the list of available configuration properties.
ckeditor.content.placeholder=Start typing here...
ckeditor.admin.saveComment=Updated the CKEditor configuration from the Administration ckeditor.admin.reset=Reset ckeditor.admin.reset.hint=Restore the default configuration ckeditor.admin.reset.confirmation=Are you sure you want to restore the default configuration? All your changes will be lost.
ckeditor.plugin.link.options=Options ckeditor.plugin.link.anchor=Anchor ckeditor.plugin.link.queryString=Query String ckeditor.plugin.link.defaultLabel=Type the link label ckeditor.plugin.link.openInNewTab=Open Link in New Tab
ckeditor.plugin.macro.placeholder=macro:{0} ckeditor.plugin.macro.buttonHint=XWiki Macro ckeditor.plugin.macro.editButtonHint=Edit Macro ckeditor.plugin.macro.refreshFailed=Failed to refresh the edited content. ckeditor.plugin.macro.dedicatedInsertButtonHint=Insert {0} macro
ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.title=Import Office File ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.filePath=File Path ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.filePath.hint=Choose the office file to import. The file will be uploaded and attached to this page and its content inserted in the content of the page. ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.filterStyles=Filter Styles ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.filterStyles.hint=Filter text styles like font, color, alignment, margins. Content structure including heading levels, paragraphs, lists and tables are preserved. ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.useOfficeViewer=Use the Office Viewer ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.useOfficeViewer.hint=Check this option if you don't plan to edit the content of the office file after the import or if you don't want to mix the content of the office file with the content that you are currently editing. ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.required=Required ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.import=Import ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.inProgress=Importing office file... ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.done=Office file successfully imported. ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.fail=Office import failed. ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.noUploadURL=File upload URL is not configured. ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.failedToLoadForm=Failed to load the form.
ckeditor.plugin.resource.notSpecified=The {0} is not specified. ckeditor.plugin.save.leaveConfirmationMessage=There are unsaved changes. Do you want to discard them? ckeditor.plugin.save.failed=The content cannot be saved because of a CKEditor internal error. You should try to copy your important changes and reload the editor. ckeditor.plugin.source.conversionFailed=Failed to perform the conversion.

property.name: Make the translations available to the JavaScript code
